meanings.definition: The act or skill of writing with a typewriter.
meanings.sent1: Her typewriting was neat and precise, showing her mastery of the machine.
meanings.sent2: I learned typewriting in school to improve my typing speed.
meanings.sent3: The typewriting class was so popular that even the principal wanted to join!
meanings.sent4: His typewriting was like a symphony of letters dancing across the page.
meanings.sent5: The sound of typewriting filled the room, creating a rhythmic melody.

meanings.definition: The written work produced by a typewriter.
meanings.sent1: The typewriting on the document was clear and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She collected old typewriting samples as a hobby.
meanings.sent3: The typewriting in the novel was so detailed, it felt like the characters came to life.
meanings.sent4: His typewriting was a window into the past, preserving stories for future generations.
meanings.sent5: The typewriting had a nostalgic charm that reminded her of her grandmother's old letters.
